1.title: Into the Wild
1.plot: Renowned bear handler Jeff Watson says goodbye to his family and friends and sets out on an adventure into the wilderness of Southern Indiana to teach his two 700lb grizzly bears Bob and Screech how to survive on their own in the wild.

2.title: To Teach a Bear to Fish
2.plot: Jeff releases his bears, Bob and Screech into the habitat where he begins his lifelong dream of re-wilding them. However the first lesson, fishing, proves more difficult than Jeff imagined and Bob appears to be falling behind Screech.

3.title: What About Bob?
3.plot: Jeff teaches the bears to forage in the wild, but Bob's foot is still a concern. When the bear slashes Jeff in the arm he refuses medical care. After he loses the bears, Jeff is forced to think about the difficulty of them actually leaving the nest.

4.title: Bears on the Run
4.plot: Jeff's unconventional hunting lessons fail to prepare Bob and Screech to hunt game in the wild, but he discovers they may be learning on their own. Meanwhile he reminisces about Grizzly Adams and agonizes over eventually parting ways with his bears.

5.title: Teenage Bears
5.plot: Jeff is pleased with Bob and Screech learning how to feed themselves. Now he teaches them how to den up for the winter. The grizzlies get territorial when Jeff's friend steps inside their habitat.

6.title: Letting Go
6.plot: As Jeff's rewilding journey with Bob and Screech nears the end, he has one painful lesson left to teach, how to fear man. Their release date is imminent but will Bob and Screech be ready to survive on their own?

imdb.plot outline: Project Grizzly follows bear trainer Jeff Watson and his two rescued bears, Bob and Screech, as Watson attempts to return them to the wild where they belong. A crisis of conscience has spurred him to do the unprecedented - introduce his two 700-pound grizzlies, animals that were raised as his kin, to the wild. Jeff must teach the bears every skill they don't currently possess in order to survive the deep wild.
imdb.title: Project Grizzly

production companies.name: This is Just a Test Productions

plot: _Project Grizzly_ (qv) follows bear trainer Jeff Watson and his two rescued bears, Bob and Screech, as Watson attempts to return them to the wild where they belong. A crisis of conscience has spurred him to do the unprecedented - introduce his two 700-pound grizzlies, animals that were raised as his kin, to the wild. Jeff must teach the bears every skill they don't currently possess in order to survive the deep wild.::Animal Planet

_Project Grizzly_ (qv) is an incredible series about world famous bear trainer, Jeff Watson and his grizzly bears, Bob and Screech. Having raised, trained and worked with bears his entire life - Jeff decides to do something that's never been done before. He is going to try to re-wild BOTH of his 700 lb grizzly bears that he has raised since babies. Jeff has to teach the 4 year old grizzlies how to hunt, fish, forage and survive in the wild. In the process, Jeff will be living amongst them, putting his life in danger. The risks are high and complications arise, but in the end Jeff loves Bob and Screech and is hoping to give them a chance to live the rest of their lives as wild grizzly bears. Will Bob and Screech learn the skills necessary to survive? And if they do will Jeff be able to let go of the bears he loves so much? Better yet, will they make it out alive? Watch to find out the answer!::Carrie DeCosta
